item.title: Starbucks CEO Announces a Huge Change to Win Back Customers
item.description: The chain is also closing more than 400 stores.

item.title: Boston Dynamics CEO Says Robots Will Replace Workers for One Particular Type of Labor
item.description: The robots aren’t coming for everyone’s jobs—just a specific kind.

item.title: This New Gadget Is an AI Wearable That Will Transcribe Your Meetings
item.description: The latest version of the Plaud device will handle more than 100 languages.

item.title: Employers Are Turning to This 2.5-Pound Device to Save Millions on Manual Labor
item.description: The costs of workplace injuries and accidents may be rising. This startup’s hardware could cut those dramatically.

item.title: Gen Z Is Ditching Stanley Cups for a $40 Water Bottle Thanks to 1 Critical Feature
item.description: Inc. 5000 honoree HydroJug’s ‘leak-proof’ straw is giving challengers a run for their money.
